name: Here and Now: Edition Three #285
description:
Here and Now: Edition Three #285
The Tower
Created by Beets (@wideawakebeets)
Ticket artwork by liasomething | 4000x4000 pixels | September 2021 
Immersive experience launches 15th October, 2021
https://wideawakeprojects.com/tower/

TRAITS
The higher the Rarity Score, the rarer it is. 

Color Range: Normal (30.63%)
Shape Is Filled: No (98.33%)
Central Color: Purple (8.49%)
Shape: Rectangle (56.63%)
Background: Black (79.79%)
Stroke: Thinner Lines (97.17%)

(The percentage represents the total # of tickets that share that trait)

RARITY SCORE (RS) = 20.1027

Highest RS: 106.4227
Lowest RS: 10.4779

HERE AND NOW aims to elevate artists, and collectors, collectively. Holding tickets from previous experiences rewards collectors. Beets is committed to creating six editions, imagine if you had all six.
View the roadmap here: https://wideawakeprojects.com/roadmap/

**If you bought this 1/1 on secondary, please DM @wideawakebeets, so he can register you as a ticketholder**
